Workdone:
Video was nice, just needed some brighting up and other small stuff to make it look better. Main reason for the readnfo is the audio. The line audio was garbage during any high action scenes. So we first clean up the line audio and clean up our Cam version audio of our first release and added CAM audio to every part that was a action scene, a total of 7 parts we did. This wasnt easy at all. We had to watch the whole movie and write down all the spot so we can cut and past audio. Syncing the CAM audio with the line audio was the bigest main in the butt, spent a total of 12 hours doing this release, Found it well worth it.
